QuestData.Title: Lost Treasure
QuestData.Description: I sense that one of my kind's artifacts has been taken and stashed away in the Cache of the Legion.$B$BWe cannot give them time to discover its power. If you would kill the Gatewatchers and retrieve it for me, I would be most grateful.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: We cannot let it fall into the wrong hands.
QuestData.LogDescription: Retrieve the Blinding Fury for A'dal from the Cache of the Legion in the Mechanar of Tempest Keep.
QuestData.RewardText: You have done well. Any advantage we can take away from Kael'thas' forces is to our benefit.
